attributes.additional_details:
On average, a community carer spends a third of a weekly pay cheque to travel from client to client. I myself travel more than 75 miles in just one week. Not only is petrol an issue but also general wear and tear, with no one to help and the company's who employ us do not pay for petrol- we all struggle.
We would like the government to help pay for our travel.
Not only do we need this but the people who receive our care
